con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.year == 2016 assert slurperresponse.date.month == "SEPTEMBER"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent)
assert slurperresponse.responseContent.size() == 1 assert slurperresponse.workDays.size() == 1 assert slurperresponse.workDays.get(0).tasks.size() == 1
assert slurperresponse.date.year.get(0) == 2016 assert slurperresponse.date.month.get(0) == "OCTOBER"
assert slurperresponse.workDays.get(0).actualDay.month == ["OCTOBER"] assert slurperresponse.workDays.get(0).actualDay.dayOfMonth == [10]
assert slurperresponse.workDays.get(0).tasks.get(0).taskId == ["5555"]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) assert slurperresponse.date.year == 2016 assert slurperresponse.date.month == "OCTOBER"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent)
assert slurperresponse.tasks.size() == 2
assert slurperresponse.actualDay.year == 2016 assert slurperresponse.actualDay.month == "OCTOBER" assert slurperresponse.actualDay.dayOfMonth == 10
assert slurperresponse.tasks.get(0).taskId == "5555" assert slurperresponse.tasks.get(1).taskId == "6666"

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseContent = messageExchange.response.responseContent slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent)
assert slurperresponse.tasks.size() == 0
assert slurperresponse.actualDay.year == 2016 assert slurperresponse.actualDay.month == "OCTOBER" assert slurperresponse.actualDay.dayOfMonth == 10
